TSName: Valid Patient Creation with All Fields
_comments: Iteration-1 - Test successful creation of a patient with all valid required and optional fields - Expected: HTTP 201 with patient JSON - Validation: Response contains patient_name and successful creation

TSName: Valid Patient Creation with Minimal Required Fields
_comments: Iteration-1 - Test successful creation of a patient with only required fields - Expected: HTTP 201 with patient JSON - Validation: Response contains patient_name and successful creation
Iteration-1 - Test successful creation of a patient with 'Other' gender option - Expected: HTTP 201 with patient JSON - Validation: Response contains patient_name and gender 'Other'
Iteration-1 - Test validation of missing required patient_name field - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about missing patient_name
Iteration-1 - Test validation of missing required gender field - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about missing gender

TSName: Missing Required Field - Date of Birth
_comments: Iteration-1 - Test validation of missing required date_of_birth field - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about missing date_of_birth
Iteration-1 - Test validation of invalid gender enum value - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about invalid gender value
Iteration-1 - Test validation of invalid email format - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about invalid email format
Iteration-1 - Test validation of invalid blood group enum value - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about invalid blood group
Iteration-1 - Test validation of invalid date format - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about invalid date format
Iteration-1 - Test duplicate patient creation with same email - Expected: HTTP 409 Conflict - Validation: Error message about existing patient or duplicate email
Iteration-1 - Test edge case with empty patient name - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about empty or invalid patient_name
Iteration-1 - Test edge case with empty email string - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request or HTTP 201 (depending on validation) - Validation: System handles empty email appropriately
Iteration-1 - Test edge case with special characters in patient name - Expected: HTTP 201 (if allowed) or HTTP 400 - Validation: System properly handles special characters
Iteration-1 - Test edge case with maximum length patient name - Expected: HTTP 201 (if within limits) or HTTP 400 - Validation: System enforces name length limits

body.patient_name: This Is A Very Long Patient Name That Tests The Maximum Length Limit For Patient Names In The Healthcare System Database

_comments: Iteration-1 - Test edge case with future birth date - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about invalid future birth date
Iteration-1 - Security test attempting SQL injection through patient_name field - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request or safe handling - Validation: System prevents SQL injection
Iteration-1 - Security test attempting XSS injection through patient_name field - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request or safe escaping - Validation: System prevents XSS attacks
Iteration-1 - Security test attempting SQL injection through email field - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request or safe handling - Validation: System prevents SQL injection
Iteration-1 - Security test with invalid credentials - Expected: HTTP 401 Unauthorized - Validation: System rejects unauthorized access
Iteration-1 - Test edge case with completely empty request body - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about missing required fields
Iteration-1 - Test edge case with null values in required fields - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request - Validation: Error message about null/invalid values
Iteration-1 - Test validation of invalid mobile number format - Expected: HTTP 400 Bad Request or successful creation with warning - Validation: System handles mobile number validation

TSName: All Blood Group Types Test - A+
_comments: Iteration-1 - Test valid blood group A+ - Expected: HTTP 201 with patient JSON - Validation: Response contains correct blood group

TSName: All Blood Group Types Test - O-
_comments: Iteration-1 - Test valid blood group O- (universal donor) - Expected: HTTP 201 with patient JSON - Validation: Response contains correct blood group
